titleStmt.title: Encyclopedia Britannica, 9th Edition, 1875-89
titleStmt.sponsor: Temple University Libraries, Digital Scholarship Center

publicationStmt.p: Produced at the Digital Scholarship Center at Temple University (Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, US) as part of the Encyclopedia Project. This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

sourceDesc.bibl: The Encyclopaedia Britannica: A Dictionary of Arts, Sciences, Literature and General Information. 9th ed., 25 vols. NY: Charles Scribner's Sons, 1875-1889.

encodingDesc.p: Text derived from original OCR by the Digital Scholarship Center, Temple University, produced with Abby FineReader 12. Source images were created by California Digital Archive, in Internet Archive, JP2 format. Print source in UC Berkeley Library, Berkeley, CA.

projectDesc.p: These texts are generated for the use of the Encyclopedia Project at Temple University, which is conducting research into the language of knowledge in the nineteenth century.
